content:
TITLE: Initializing PyTgCalls and Playing Media
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to initialize PyTgCalls client and play media in a Telegram voice chat. Requires a configured MTProto client and chat ID. The code demonstrates basic setup and media playback functionality.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pytgcalls/pytgcalls/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
from pytgcalls import PyTgCalls
from pytgcalls import idle
...
chat_id = -1001185324811
app = PyTgCalls(client)
app.start()
app.play(
    chat_id,
    'http://docs.evostream.com/sample_content/assets/sintel1m720p.mp4',
)
idle()
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing PyTgCalls via Package Managers
DESCRIPTION: Installation commands for PyTgCalls library using either Git or PyPi package manager. PyPi installation is recommended for most users while Git installation provides access to the latest development version.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pytgcalls/pytgcalls/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# With Git
pip install git+https://github.com/pytgcalls/pytgcalls -U

# With PyPi (Recommended)
pip install py-tgcalls -U
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the Whisper transcription example with py-tgcalls
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute the example script that uses Whisper for speech-to-text transcription in Telegram calls. The script waits for 2 seconds of silence before transcribing the speech.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pytgcalls/pytgcalls/blob/master/example/whisper_transcription/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
python3 example_transcription.py
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing faster-whisper for STT integration
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the faster-whisper package which is required for the speech-to-text functionality in this example.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pytgcalls/pytgcalls/blob/master/example/whisper_transcription/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pip3 install faster-whisper
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Specifying yt-dlp Package Dependency
DESCRIPTION: Lists yt-dlp as a dependency for the pytgcalls project. yt-dlp is a YouTube video downloader fork of youtube-dl that provides improved functionality for downloading media from various platforms.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pytgcalls/pytgcalls/blob/master/example/youtube_dl/requirements.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
yt-dlp
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building the Docker Image for PyTGCalls
DESCRIPTION: Command to build a Docker image tagged as 'docker_example' from the current directory.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pytgcalls/pytgcalls/blob/master/example/docker_example/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker build . -t docker_example
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the Docker Image on Linux
DESCRIPTION: Command for Linux users to run the Docker image with the current directory mounted to the container and execute a Python script.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pytgcalls/pytgcalls/blob/master/example/docker_example/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker run -it -v $(pwd):/app -w /app docker_example python3.13 docker_example.py
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the Docker Image on Windows
DESCRIPTION: Command for Windows users to run the Docker image with the current directory mounted to the container and execute a Python script.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pytgcalls/pytgcalls/blob/master/example/docker_example/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker run -it -v ${PWD}:/app -w /app docker_example python3.13 docker_example.py
```
